Articles.Content:
Apologies if this is the wrong place for this. When I launch the game from ksp.exe,  ksp64.exe, Admin etc.. it always crashes half way through loading. I did not change any files, but the game did automatically update through steam. I saved the files, then uninstalled from steam for a fresh boot. Still won't load, same error. I know you need the error.log but I do not see how to upload files. 

 

Unity Player [version: Unity 5.4.0p4_b15b5ae035b7]
mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0033:2b8c0e18.
Error occurred at 2018-01-06_220010.
H:\Games\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP_x64.exe, run by Mike.
38% memory in use.
16328 MB physical memory [9969 MB free].
16650 MB paging file [9705 MB free].
134217728 MB user address space [134215328 MB free].
Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation.

8 hours ago, ph4zed1 said:

but the game did automatically update through steam.

then uninstalled from steam for a fresh boot.

Steam will not remove your old mods. You have to go to your gamedata folder and remove all of that old stuff manually.
Thank you! There was an outdated Redux file hidden in the Squad folder that I didn't see.
